header.tagline: A Path to Equitable Learning for Every Child

hero.title: Shaping the Future of Inclusive Education in Indonesia.
hero.subtitle: Welcome to the movement to fulfill the promise of inclusive education. In line with Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) 4, we believe every child deserves a quality learning opportunity. Although Indonesia has over 40,000 schools that accept students with special needs, significant challenges remain: a lack of accessible learning resources and vital early detection.

point1.title: Fact
point1.description: Nearly 30% of children with disabilities in Indonesia do not have access to education.

point2.title: Gap
point2.description: Many schools are not yet ready, with only a small fraction having trained guidance teachers.

point3.title: Our Vision
point3.description: Bridging this gap with a digital platform for learning and developmental screening, empowering teachers, parents, and, most importantly, every child.

challenge.title: The Reality We Face
challenge.subtitle: Understanding the challenges of inclusive education in Indonesia
challenge.description: While the vision of inclusive education is clear, the path to implementation faces significant obstacles that require our collective attention and action.

challenge1.title: Limited Infrastructure
challenge1.description: Many schools lack the physical and technological infrastructure needed to support diverse learning needs.

challenge2.title: Teacher Training Gaps
challenge2.description: Educators often lack specialized training to effectively teach students with diverse abilities.

challenge3.title: Social Stigma
challenge3.description: Cultural misconceptions and stigma continue to create barriers for children with disabilities.

solution.title: Strategic Solutions
solution.subtitle: Comprehensive approaches to building inclusive education systems
solution.description: We believe in practical, scalable solutions that address the root causes of educational exclusion.

solution1.title: Infrastructure Development
solution1.description: Building accessible learning environments with modern technology and adaptive tools.

solution2.title: Teacher Empowerment
solution2.description: Comprehensive training programs that equip educators with inclusive teaching strategies.

solution3.title: Community Engagement
solution3.description: Fostering partnerships between schools, families, and communities to create supportive ecosystems.

callToAction.title: Join the Movement
callToAction.subtitle: Together, we can create a more inclusive future for every child
callToAction.description: Whether you're an educator, parent, policymaker, or concerned citizen, there's a role for you in this transformative journey.

footer.description: EdusiaHub is dedicated to advancing inclusive education in Indonesia through research, advocacy, and practical solutions.
